title: Master Elementalist Lux Bundle

replies.body:
Hey Castio! 

As musaabali pointed out, you receive several icons with the purchase of the skin, and the Master Collection will unlock the others, as well as a ward. This is the breakdown - 

https://imgur.com/a/gfosi

Hope this helps! Lemme know if you have any questions!
The skin gives you the 4 basic elements + light. The bundle gives the 5 extra icons(lightning,mystic, ect).
